description: Henbant Fferm Paramaethu focuses on sustainable agriculture and education, operating as a wilding farm and learning space. It offers various activities, including wild camping, educational courses, and a market garden, all while promoting community engagement and environmental stewardship. The founders transitioned from previous careers to create a space that emphasizes regenerative practices and biodiversity. They aim to empower individuals through hands-on learning experiences, fostering a connection to the land and food systems. The initiative also explores cooperative structures to enhance collaboration with local producers and ensure long-term sustainability.
name: Henbant Fferm Paramaethu
